headline: Capital One receives final regulatory approvals for acquisition of Discover
summary: Capital One Financial (COF) and Discover Financial Services (DFS) announced that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency have approved Capital One’s proposed acquisition of Discover. This approval follows approval of the transaction by the Delaware State Bank Commissioner in December 2024, and by shareholders of more than 99% of each company’s shares voting in February of this year.
